about_the_game:
Solace Inc. is back and ready to kick some ass! Join the crew, grab some weapons, and travel across spacetime to fight some baddies... or fight each other?

Solace Inc. 2 is an expansion of the first game's universe in a brand new dimension, with new worlds and foes as well as familiar places and faces. Play as a wide variety of unique characters with an expansive arsenal of weapons, and fight against a variety of foes ranging from alien insects, to rogue robots, to screaming demons, and more!

Features:

  • 10+ playable characters with unique special abilities and attributes

  • Dozens of unlockable and craftable weapons

  • Wide variety of worlds to explore and fight in

  • Charming dialogue from a vast cast of characters

  • Challenging foes and bosses who don't like you very much

  • ...and more!

We're still hiring, submit your application to Solace Inc. today!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains mature and suggestive content, which includes:

- Occasional swearing
- Exaggerated body proportions (i.e. large breasts)
- Jiggle physics (can be disabled)
- Revealing outfits
- Mild violence and cartoon-ish blood
